content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [Name]
,[NOC]
,[Discipline]
 FROM [tokyoolympic].[dbo].[athletes]


 --count the number of athletes from each country
 SELECT NOC, Count(*) AS TotalAthletes
 from athletes
 Group By NOC
 ORDER BY TotalAthletes DESC;

 --calculate total medals won by each country

SELECT
Team_NOC,
SUM(Gold) Total_Gold,
SUM(Silver) Total_Silver,
SUM(Bronze) Total_Bronze
FROM [tokyoolympic].[dbo].[medals]
Group By TEAM_NOC
ORDER BY Total_Gold DESC;


--Calculate the average number of entries by gender from each discipline
SELECT Discipline,
AVG(Female) Avg_Female,
AVG(Male) Avg_Male
FROM entriesgender
WHERE Discipline = 'Artistic Swimming'
GROUP BY Discipline;

--Calculate
